snippet: Chris Lighty, one of the most powerful managers in hip-hop, helped knock down the wall that separated that culture from the mainstream.
abstract: Jon Caramanica recalls the career of influential hip-hop manager Chris Lighty after his death at age 44; notes that Lighty was largely responsible for bridging the gap between rap music and mainstream culture.
lead_paragraph: Chris Lighty, one of the most powerful managers in hip-hop, helped knock down the wall that separated that culture from the mainstream.

headline.seo: Chris Lighty, Hip-Hop Manager, Changed Music
headline.main: He Took Hip-Hop From Gritty to Global
headline.print_headline: He Took Hip-Hop From Gritty To Global
